titles.title: SARMs Control Act of 2019
SARMs Control Act of 2019
Selective Androgen Receptor Modulators Control Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to more effectively regulate selective androgen receptor modulators, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Selective Androgen Receptor Modulators Control Act of 2019 or the SARMs Control Act of 2019
This bill expands the federal regulatory framework for drugs that are deemed to pose a risk of abuse and dependence to address selective androgen receptor modulators. These are synthetic drugs or substances that have effects similar to testosterone.
